description: The 38-year-old rapper took to Twitter once again early Friday to address the kinky things his 32-year-old model ex had written about him on the same microblog a day earlier.
title: Kanye West responds to THAT crude Amber Rose tweet about sex life
title_page: Kanye West responds to THAT crude Amber Rose tweet about sex life | Daily Mail Online
text:
Kanye West has responded to ex-girlfriend Amber Rose's rather explicit insight to their private life.
The rapper, 38, evidently wanted to make abundantly clear what he is and isn't into in the bedroom department as he took to Twitter early on Friday morning to address the claims.
Yeezy let loose on the model, 32, once again, describing her as 'mad' in response to her recent revelations about their somewhat fruity sex life.
Scroll down for video
Hitting back: Kanye West responded early Friday to Amber Rose's explicit tweet about him
Clarification: The 38-year-old rapper wanted fans to know that he was not exactly into what his ex accused him of on the microblogging site
Not one to shy away from letting his opinion be known, Kanye wrote: 'Exes can be mad but just know I never let them play with my a**… I don’t do that… I stay away from that area all together.'
He followed up that gem, with perhaps a little too much information about his personal life as he even mentioned wife Kim Kardashian.
He wrote: 'I’m not into that kind of s***… I like pictures and videos. Me and my wife got the kind of love that can turn exes into best friends.'
The All Of The Lights hitmaker was responding to a rather shocking and sexually explicit post by Amber that caused a collective gasp across the internet.
See Kanye West updates as he responds to THAT crude Amber Rose tweet on their sex life
TMI? He gave a little insight into his personal life with his next tweet
Dynamic duo: Kanye said he and wife Kim Kardashian - pictured together at his fashion show in New York back in September - have the 'kind of love that can turn exes into best friends'
It read: 'Awww @kanyewest are u mad I'm not around to play in ur a*****e anymore?#FingersInTheBootyA**B**ch.'
This came after Kanye's epic Twitter rant aimed at her ex-husband, Wiz Khalifa, which also mentioned their 23-month-old son Sebastian.
Initially, Kanye, 38, referred to Amber as a 'stripper' and implied she was a gold digger by referencing lyrics to his hit song during an exchange with Wiz.
Kanye wrote: 'You let a stripper trap you.'
Hitting back: The 32-year-old model did not take lightly to Kanye's Twitter rant about her ex Wiz Khalifa on Wednesday as she responded with a rather crude tweet
'You're getting bodied by a stripper': Amber also addressed the fact that Kanye had deleted the tweets
'I know you mad every time you look at your child that this girl got you for 18 years', Kanye tweeted referencing Wiz's soon to be three-year-old son Sebastian with Amber.
'You wouldn’t have a child if it wasn’t for me.'
Kanye later deleted his tweets after Amber got involved and she tweeted soon after: 'Lol Now u wanna delete ur tweets cuz Muva has arrived?'
Things have reached such a fever pitch that an iconic daytime personality has offered to have the trio settle their differences on his show.
Jerry Springer also took to Twitter on Thursday morning as he said: 'Hey @kanyewest, @wizkhalifa and @DaRealAmberRose, don't fight! I think you should settle this on my show.'
Back in the day: Kanye dated Amber for two years from 2008 to 2010, as they are pictured together in New York back in March 2009
The feud began when Kanye announced he changed the name of his upcoming album to Waves, which Wiz took umbrage to and later tweeted something involving 'KK,' which appeared to set Kanye off but later admitted it was a misunderstanding as it was actually a reference to marijuana.
As Kanye took 'KK' to be a reference to his wife Kim Kardashian, he blasted Wiz for it, as well as accusing him of stealing his style from his rap protege Kid Cudi.
Kanye dated Amber for two years from 2008 to 2010.
Their relationship has been up for discussion as of late. In a leaked track from his upcoming seventh studio album, Kanye appears to blast his ex by suggesting she doesn't look as good as she used to.
A snippet from the track features the lyrics: 'My ex said she gave me the best years of her life, I saw a recent picture of her, guess she was right.'
Working title: This all began on Tuesday night when Kanye announced he had changed his album title to Waves
Not pleased: As currently incarcerated rapper Max B is credited with the Wave movement, Kanye paid his respects but Wiz still seemed skeptical
Interesting initials: Wiz mentioned 'kk' and it seemed to set Kanye off as he thought it was a reference to his wife Kim Kardashian
Explanation: Wiz did not respond very much during Kanye's epic rant but he did explain what 'KK' actually meant
Clarification: Kanye did admit that everything involving 'KK' was a misunderstanding and that it was actually a reference to marijuana
Making it personal: Kanye also took aim at Amber and Wiz's son, Sebastian, as he wrote 'you own waves ??? I own your child !!!'
It's fair to say the relationship did not end amicably with Amber previously branding Kim, the mother of Kanye's two children, a 'homewrecker'.
Kanye was bold about slamming his former girlfriend in 2015 when he said in an interview that he had to take '30 showers' after dating Amber.
He candidly confessed: 'If Kim had dated me when I wanted, there would be no Amber Rose.'
The rapper is said to have had his eye on Keeping Up With The Kardashians star Kim as early as 2008, naming her his 'girl of the week' in early blog posts which resurfaced in October 2014.
He added in the one-to-one: 'It's very hard for a woman to want to be with someone that's with Amber Rose. I had to take 30 showers before I got with Kim.'
Amber and Wiz married in July 2013 but filed for divorce just over a year later in September 2014. They remain amicable.
